column2: Smiledrive Portable Handheld Electronic Digital Lcd Weighing Scale
column14: Smiledrive Portable Handheld Electronic Digital Lcd Weighing Scale: Flipkart.com
column17:
Smiledrive Portable Handheld Electronic Digital Lcd Weighing Scale (Metal Black) Price: Rs.899

Ever been charged for baggage overweight Didnt you at that time wish if there was some kind of a weighing scale which could check your luggage weight before hand. Here's an answer. This Portable Electronic LCD Display weighing scale is a must have. Know exactly how much you are carrying before you board that flight. Room temperature display Zero and tare Very simple to operate Small and light weight suitable to carry Blue backlight function Tare function Auto power off Data lock function with sound indication Over load indication Low battery indication High precision strain gauge sensors system Specifications - 0.44 inch (11.3 mm) LCD digits Low battery or over load indication Capacity - 50kg or 110 lb Graduation - 10g or 0.02lb Power - 1 x 3V lithium cell (CR2032) (included) Size - 130mm (L) x 62mm (W) x 30mm (D) Packing include - 1 x Electronic Luggage Scale - Up to 50kg 1 x Battery (3V lithium cell - CR2032) 1 x English Users Manual.
